languages.text: {n}Схватив младших за вороты, Лорна виновато склоняет их в поклоне.{/n} "П-простите, Ваша Светлость, это моя вина! Люми и Роно слишком увлекаются делом, но я прослежу, чтобы впредь они не забывали о манерах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Схватив младших за шелковые вороты, Лорна виновато склоняет их в поклоне.{/n} "П-простите, Ваша Светлость, это моя вина! Люми и Роно иногда слишком увлекаются своим делом, но я прослежу, чтобы впредь они не забывали о манерах".

languages.text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."
languages.original_text: {n}Схватив младших за вороты, Лорна виновато склоняет их в поклоне.{/n} "П-простите, Ваша Светлость, это моя вина! Люми и Роно слишком увлекаются делом, но я прослежу, чтобы впредь они не забывали о манерах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! It was my fault! Lumi and Rono get too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

{n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! It was my fault! Lumi and Rono get too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

{n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

{n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

{n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

{n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

languages.text: {n}Lorna saisit son frère et sa sœur au col et les force à s'incliner d'un air coupable.{/n} « T-toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! C'est entièrement ma faute ! Lumi et Rono ont tendance à se laisser absorber par leur travail, mais je veillerai à ce qu'ils n'oublient plus jamais les bonnes manières. »
languages.original_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorna saisit son frère et sa sœur au col et les force à s'incliner d'un air coupable.{/n} « T-toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! C'est entièrement ma faute ! Lumi et Rono ont tendance à se laisser absorber par leur travail, mais je veillerai à ce qu'ils n'oublient plus jamais les bonnes manières. »

languages.text: {n}Lorna agarra a sus hermanos menores por los cuellos de la ropa y les obliga a hacer una reverencia con aspecto culpable.{/n} «Lo... ¡Lo siento mucho, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡La culpa es mía! Lumi y Rono suelen abstraerse con su trabajo, pero me aseguraré de que no vuelven a olvidar sus modales».
languages.original_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorna agarra a sus hermanos menores por los cuellos de la ropa y les obliga a hacer una reverencia con aspecto culpable.{/n} «Lo... ¡Lo siento mucho, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡La culpa es mía! Lumi y Rono suelen abstraerse con su trabajo, pero me aseguraré de que no vuelven a olvidar sus modales».

languages.text: {n}ローナは、やってしまったという表情で、弟と妹の襟をつかんで頭を下げさせる。{/n}「申し訳ありません、陛下！悪いのは私です！ルミとロノは作業に熱中しすぎる傾向がありまして…二度とマナーを蔑ろにしないように私がしっかりと見ておきます」
languages.original_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

traits.locale_text: {n}ローナは、やってしまったという表情で、弟と妹の襟をつかんで頭を下げさせる。{/n}「申し訳ありません、陛下！悪いのは私です！ルミとロノは作業に熱中しすぎる傾向がありまして…二度とマナーを蔑ろにしないように私がしっかりと見ておきます」

languages.text: {n}洛娜一脸内疚，赶紧抓住她弟弟妹妹的领子，让他们鞠了个躬。{/n}“对不起，大人！这都怪我！露米和罗诺一忙起来，就经常顾不上别的事情，但我会保证他们不会再忘记礼节。”
languages.original_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

traits.locale_text: {n}洛娜一脸内疚，赶紧抓住她弟弟妹妹的领子，让他们鞠了个躬。{/n}“对不起，大人！这都怪我！露米和罗诺一忙起来，就经常顾不上别的事情，但我会保证他们不会再忘记礼节。”

languages.text: {n}Lorna ergreift mit schuldbewusster Miene die Krägen ihrer jüngeren Geschwister und lässt sie sich verbeugen.{/n} "V-Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es ist meine Schuld! Lumi und Rono gehen viel zu sehr in ihrer Arbeit auf, aber ich werde dafür sorgen, dass sie ihre Manieren nicht noch einmal vergessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorna ergreift mit schuldbewusster Miene die Krägen ihrer jüngeren Geschwister und lässt sie sich verbeugen.{/n} "V-Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es ist meine Schuld! Lumi und Rono gehen viel zu sehr in ihrer Arbeit auf, aber ich werde dafür sorgen, dass sie ihre Manieren nicht noch einmal vergessen."

languages.text: {n}Kabahatli gibi duran Lorna, küçük kardeşlerini yakalarından çekerek önünde eğdiriyor.{/n} "Ku... Kusura bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bu benim hatam! Lumi ve Rono, çalışmalarına dalıp gitmeye pek meyillilerdir. Görgü kurallarını bir kez daha unutmayacaklarından emin olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Lorna grabs her younger siblings' collars and makes them bow, looking guilty.{/n} "M-my apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I am to blame! Lumi and Rono tend to get far too engrossed in their work, but I will see to it that they do not forget their manners again."
